Citation.sTitle: Liquid-Liquid Extraction of Alcohols from Their Azeotropic Mixtures with Hexane Using Ionic Liquid
Citation.sAbstract: The phase behavior of alkane/alcohol/ionic liquid ternary systems are essential for designing separation process of alcohol from its mixture with alkane. In this work, 1-ethyl-3metylimidazolium thiocyanate ([Emim][SCN]) has been experimentally studied as an extractive agent for this process. New experimental liquid-liquid equilibria (LLE) data for four ternary systems
